sentences.en: Again , this rule has been indicated by an annotation on the diagram.
sentences.cn: 这些关系的约束规则已经在图上作了注解.

sentences.en: Annotation: The act or process of furnishing critical commentary or explanatory notes.
sentences.cn: 注解: 评注性的解释或说明性的注释的行为或过程.

sentences.en: Annotations: Select and order the annotation fields to display in the prototype.
sentences.cn: 标注: 选择显示在原型中的标注字段,并设定顺序.

sentences.en: From the shortcut menu click New Text Annotation.
sentences.cn: 从快捷菜单中单击“新建文本批注”.

sentences.en: Index not allowed in footnote endnote , header , footer, or annotation.
sentences.cn: 不能在脚注、尾注 、 页眉 、 页脚或批注中使用索引.

sentences.en: Position index annotation shape and connect to roles to be indexed.
sentences.cn: 定位索引批注形状,并连接到要编制索引的角色.

sentences.en: Qiang Zhongshu composed Selected Annotation of Song Poems.
sentences.cn: 而《谈艺录》对宋诗,尤其对苏轼、安石、庭坚、与义等,都有精辟独到的评论.

sentences.en: She retained a number of copies for further annotation.
sentences.cn: 她保留了许多副本以便作进一步的注解。

sentences.en: Table not allowed in footnote endnote , header, footer, annotation, or text box.
sentences.cn: 不能在脚注、尾注 、 页眉 、 页脚 、 批注或文本框中使用表格.

sentences.en: The internal data structures are based on annotation graphs.
sentences.cn: 其内部数据结构建立在注释图表的基础上.

sentences.en: The method to add Chinese annotation in PCB with C - language was discussed.
sentences.cn: 论述了用C语言在pcb中加中文注释的方法.

sentences.en: The paper presents the technique of students - initiated annotation in ELT writing.
sentences.cn: 在二语写作教学中,教师评阅及写作者修改占有重要地位.

sentences.en: This type of annotation may be extremely useful for bibliographies and booklists.
sentences.cn: 这种形式的“注释”对书目和目录极为有用.

sentences.en: Valid annotation type values range from 0 to 11, inclusive.
sentences.cn: 有效批注类型值的范围为从0到11, 包括0和11.

sentences.en: You entered multiple destinations for a page, line, footnote, endnote, or annotation.
sentences.cn: 您输入了多个页 、 行 、 脚注 、 尾注或批注目标.

trans.tran_en: Annotation is the activity of annotating something
